meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Fall</kanji> into the life of a <kanji>degenerate</kanji> and you'll probably get involved in lots of <vocabulary>corruption</vocabulary>. Stealing, stabbing, money laundering, that kind of stuff.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
